Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClient, SocketClient, SocketClientHandler, SocketClientProxy
public interface VirtualView extends Remote
This interface is used to define the methods that the virtual view must implement. The virtual view is the entity that manages the communication between the server and the clients.
